column1: #Text=Nuktuk says : " You ca n't die Juji !
#Text=At least ... I got to be your friend .
#Text=It seems like this mover is really getting to you .
#Text=You do know Juji 's not really dead ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Of course I know .
#Text=He comes back to life in the end when the doomsday device shifts the polarity of the Earth .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I guess I just miss my friends .
#Text=Everything is going so well for me , but it feels empty without everyone around .
#Text=Korra 's gone , Mako 's in jail , you 're doing ... business - lady stuff .
#Text=Things have changed to much since we first met .
#Text=Why do n't you come back in and finish watching the mover with me ?
